subject: Jungle Jungle
text:
For ethnicity 
draped in gasoline
you burn the sky.

Who was fighting a
jungle abandoning
every thought? 

Step aside, 
mirror, Oh mirror, 
I am going up in heap of flames.

This self-annihilation.
Will it take you to
promised heaven of deaf gods? 

The dust, the heat, the soot.
They are going to blacken your
entrals. How will you come out in moon?
